title: DESC SECRET command: Add INTEGRATION_NAME column | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: This behavior change is in the 2024_01 bundle.
For the current status of the bundle, refer to Bundle History.
The behavior of the DESCRIBE SECRET command is as follows:
The output of the command did not include the integration_name column
The output of the command includes the integration_name column as the last column in the output.

Specifies the name of the External API Authentication integration that references the secret or NULL if the integration does not
specify a secret.
